subject: Baseball
Veterans
World War II (1939-45)
lead_paragraph: Lou Brissie went from the brink of having his left leg amputated in World War II to playing for the 1949 American League All-Star team at Ebbets Field in Brooklyn.
snippet: Lou Brissie went from the brink of having his left leg amputated in World War II to playing for the 1949 American League All-Star team at Ebbets Field in Brooklyn.
